top_themes: Arabica futures up 70-100% in past year
Contextual political complaints about high prices

query_results.top_post: @katy_merrifield ENOUGH with the misinformation!!! Prices for coffee have gone up around the entire planet ! The Arabica futures, the global benchmark to measure the price coffee, went up 70-100% in the last year! ...
"ENOUGH with the misinformation!!! Prices for coffee have gone up around the entire planet ! The Arabica futures... went up 70-100% in the last year!" (anniedufour99, 46 likes)

reason: Fed Policy Shock: HAWKISH_PIVOT - FOMC minutes released on February 18, 2026, revealed a surprising shift where officials discussed potential rate hikes if inflation remains high. This hawkish tilt was reinforced by February 20 PCE data showing inflation stalled at 3%, effectively ending expectations for near-term rate cuts.

payload.summary: FOMC minutes released on February 18, 2026, revealed a surprising shift where officials discussed potential rate hikes if inflation remains high. This hawkish tilt was reinforced by February 20 PCE data showing inflation stalled at 3%, effectively ending expectations for near-term rate cuts.
payload.market_impact: Significant US Dollar (DXY) appreciation and rising Treasury yields; commodities including gold and Bitcoin experienced sharp declines following the news.
